jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description: A senior developer thinks strategically and has a deep understanding of all stages of digital development for apps and the web. A senior developer may manage a team of developers and will be expected to encourage creativity and efficiency throughout complex digital projects.

jobs.title: Web Design UI/UX
jobs.description: UI/UX designers are responsible for creating user-centered designs for digital products, such as websites, mobile apps, and software interfaces. Their primary focus is on enhancing user satisfaction and usability by improving the accessibility, efficiency, and aesthetics of the product.

jobs.title: Junior Front-End Dev
jobs.description: You will work closely with our designers to improve usability for our customers. You will optimize web designs for mobile devices and other platforms for maximum speed. You will work closely with designers to ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency.
